It was her diapers, she had accidentally found an old one in her apartment and tried it on for the heck of it. She found that she liked it, so whenever she was having a bad day she would put one on and relax and do whatever she needed to do at home. Today was definitely one of those days, as she snuck off to her bedroom to where she kept the diapers hidden. She squealed in delight as she picked one up and quickly takes her pants off and tapes the diaper on. She looked down and admired it; it was light purple with a bright pink indicator strip running down the middle and four tapes holding it tightly to her crotch.
         After putting the diaper on, Orihime remained in her room and said her sorrows to her brother then did her homework and finally fell asleep on her bed wearing nothing but the diaper and a t-shirt. Tatski came home soon after Orihime had fallen asleep and quickly showered after a long day then went to Orihime's room to make sure she was alright. Hearing snoring, and remembering what that day was, Tatski quickly ducked her head in just to make sure Orihime was covered for the night and qas suprised at to what she saw. Her best friend was sprawled out on her bed wearing nothing but a T-shirt and a large diaper! Tatski wasn't sure what to think, and quietly covered Orihime with a blanket before going to bed herself. The next morning...

         "Wetting your diaper," Tatski said, putting the new diaper underneath her, "you were in it for a few hours this time, so you should have a good idea if you liked it or not I would think."
         "I umm..." Orihime said, blushing, "I liked it."
         "Well good!" Tatski said, tickling Orihime's tummy a little as she finished powdering her. "So maybe you didn't want to be changed, hmm?" Tatski giggled.
         Orihime giggled too as Tatski taped up her diaper. "Thanks mommy Tatski." Orihime said hugging her. As she pulled away, she realized what she said, "Sorry, I didn't mean that, I just wanted to say thanks for changing me." Orihime blushed as she tried explaining.
         Tatski laughed, "It's okay Orihime, did you want me to treat you more like a baby?"
         "I don't know," she whined, "I don't want things to get weird."
         "Orihime, I'm already changing your dirty diapers." Tatski said, pointing to the still open poopy diaper and still open wet diaper. "You can't really weird me out, okay? So just relax and enjoy using your diapers. I'll ask you again tomorrow if you want me to baby you, you can tell me then."
         "Okay," Orihime said, "do you need help taking care of those?"
         "Nope, I can get it." Tatski said, as she rolled up the wet diaper. "I don't know where we'll put these though..." Tatski said.
         "Ohh I have an idea!" Orihime said, "Put them in the corner of my room!"
         "But Orihime, then your room will smell like dirty diaper."
         "I know, I like the smell though." she said. "Plus," she said, crawling over to Tatski and picking up the rolled up wet diaper, "I kindof like how they feel."
         "Okay Orihime, that works for me." Tatski said, rolling up the poopy diaper ever so gently. "Catch!" Tatski yelled, tossing the messy diaper to Orihime.
         Orihime giggled as she caught the poopy diaper and felt it around a bit. "Does this bother you Tatski?"
         "Not really, just make sure you wash your hands after you play with your dirty diapers okay? And please don't break them open, or at least if you do, don't let them leak on the floor." Tatski said, standing up. "What do you want to do now?"
         Orihime tossed the two dirty diapers over to the corner of her room, "I don't know, I'm hungry though."
         "Okay, let's order out!" Tatski said, "you can tell me what you want."
         Tatski got both orders placed and after an hour, they both had full bellies. Conversation at dinner was very minimal, both were too hungry to talk much. After dinner, they went to their rooms to do some homework for a few hours. "Finally," Tatski said to herself, "all done. Now I can enjoy the rest of break." She looked at the time, it had been a few hours since dinner. "Maybe I should go check on Orihime..." Tatski said as she got up to walk to her room. "Orihime, are you okay in there?" Tatski asked, knocking on her door.
         Orihime waddled over to the door and opened it, "Hi Tatski!" Orihime yelled, hugging her. Orihime had ditched the bra she was wearing earlier, now she only had her diaper and a light T-shirt on.
         "Well hello to you too." Tatski said, hugging back. "Did you need a diaper change?"
         "I don't think so," Orihime said, "I think I'm done for the night, how about you?"
         "I finished all my work, and I think I'm gonna go to bed." Tatski yawned. "I wanted to make sure you were clean still."
         "Okay," Orihime said, "umm, Tatski?"
         "Yeah Orihime?"
         "Can I..." she blushed, "sleep with you tonight?"
         "Sure Orihime, come on let's get ready for bed." Tatski smiled. "What's gotten into her?" she said to herself. Orihime smiled and waddled after Tatski.

         Both girls quickly brushed their teeth and jumped into Tatski's bed, Orihime curled up next to Tatski as the latter put her arm over her to keep her close. Eventually, Orihime's butt got pushed up against Tatski during the middle of the night. Orihime stirred slightly, as she felt the need to go. Careful not to disturb Tatski, she began wetting her diaper again quite heavily. Tatski stayed asleep the entire time, much to Orihime's relief. As she finished wetting the diaper, Orihime began drifting back to sleep, unaware of the growing urge to fill her diaper.
1111111111.title: after the movie

11111111111.content:
As the sun rose up the next morning, the two girls began to stir. Tatski was still clad in only a t-shirt and some short shorts, while Orihime was wearing her t-shirt and wet diaper. Orihime yawned as she snuggled closer to Tatski, the latter putting her arm around Orihime and feeling her diaper. "You're a little wet this morning Orihime," Tatski teased, "but it's not warm, you didn't wet on accident did you?"
         She shook her head, "Nope, I was awake when I did it." Orihime put her hand next to Tatski's on the diaper, "I guess it is a little colder than the last time you felt it," Orihime giggled as she grabbed Tatski's hand and began wetting the diaper again, "this should fix it!"
         "Hey now!" Tatski laughed a little as well, she could feel the warmth on the outside of Orihime's diaper. "You're gonna pay for that sometime Orihime," Tatski teased, "remember I'm the only one who can change you!"
         Orihime stopped giggling, "I'm sorry Tatski, that was a bit much I guess."
         "Relax Orihime, I know you're just having fun. I am too." Tatski said. "Just don't pee directly on me, I don't think we're at that stage yet."
         "What do you mean?" Orihime asked.
         "Like with how babies sometime pee during diaper changes?"
         Orihime giggled, "Oh, well don't worry I won't do that." Then her expression turned serious, "I don't want to make you hate me or gross you out. You've been extremely nice and understanding and... thank you." Orihime said, hugging Tatski.
         "You're welcome Orihime," Tatski said, returning the hug. "You know, this diaper stuff isn't so bad. I'm getting used to seeing you in a diaper, and I even kindof like you wetting your diaper with my hand there." Tatski blushed, sitting up.
         "Really?" Orihime asked, "when did that start?"
         "I don't know, I just... liked it. I can't really explain why, but I enjoyed you being so happy and..." Tatski tried explaining.
         "Shh," Orihime interrupted as she sat back up too, "I know what you mean, and you can enjoy whatever you want too Tatski." Orihime smiled at her friend, who smiled back.
         "Now then, do you need a change? Or do you still need to go?" Tatski asked.
         "I'm all done I think, and I think the diaper is past its time." Orihime said, showing Tatski how soaked the thing was.
         "Okay, well let's get you cleaned up then." Tatski said, as the two came back into Orihime's room. "Whew," Tatski said, "okay, we're gonna get you a dirty diaper bin and a few air fresheners today." she said, smelling the dirty diapers from the previous day.
         Orihime pouted a little, "But I like the dirty diaper smell..."
         "I don't think it's very sanitary for you to have dirty diapers strewn about, but we can compromise on the air fresheners a bit I suppose." Tatski said as she helped Orihime onto the changing pad. "It's not like you're gonna run out of dirty diapers anyway Orihime, you'll be making more of them so you can enjoy them then okay?" Tatski said as she opened Orihime's diaper up.
         "Yeah I guess," Orihime said, pulling her legs up, "sorry Tatski."
         "I'm sorry Orihime, I just want you to be safe and healthy too okay?" Tatski reassured her nearly nude friend as she powdered her bum, "you don't need to be sorry, but just know I still care about you enjoying yourself too." Tatski taped up Orihime's diaper and the two walked back to the kitchen. "In fact, how about you call Rukia after breakfast and see if she wants to be diapered with you, okay?" Tatski suggested.
         "You mean it?" Orihime gleamed.
         "Yep, you go ahead and pick out what you want to eat while I use the bathroom." Tatski said as she headed off.
         "Okay." Orihime called. "Hmm..." she said to herself, "what to make for breakfast..." As usual, Orihime had her lust for delicious foods that most others would never try combining together, and she ended up making eggs with peanut butter and syrup with some pancakes that had celery in them.
         Tatski came back from the bathroom a few minutes later to find the odd ingredients mixed together, almost regretting having had Orihime make breakfast. She laughed as she said, "Well I see your appetite for the unusual hasn't changed. Want some help?" Tatski asked, to which Orihime nodded as the two began cooking together.


         "Well that was better than I thought." Tatski said to herself as she put the dishes away. Orihime had loved the breakfast a lot as she ate several plates, and the two had made conversation about how things at school are and Tatski asking Orihime about Ichigo and whatnot much to Orihime's chagrin. Tatski promised to not invite him over and to make sure Orihime was out of diapers if she needed to see him, he was gone for a few months anyway. Orihime was currently talking with Rukia...
         "So do you want to do it Rukia?"
         "I don't know Orihime," Rukia said, "wait give that..."
         "Hi Orihime, this is Yoruichi," the phone said, causing Orihime to gasp a little, "Rukia would love to come over and play with you." A small little voice could be heard in the background. "We'll be over soon, bye!"
         "Hey Tatski!" Orihime happily yelled. "Rukia is coming, and Yoruichi is too."
         "Oh, umm..." Tatski started, "is Yoruichi getting diapered too?" she asked as they heard a knock on the door...
11111111111.title: Morning

choices: decides to help take care of Orihime
111111111111.content:
“I’ll get it,” Tatsuki said still dressed in her loose fitting purple T-shirt and black shorts, she opened the door and saw Yoruichi and Rukia standing on the foot of their door “hello Miss Yoruichi, and hi Rukia. Come on in.” Tatsuki said leading the pair inside.
         “Thanks Tatsuki,” Yoruichi said as she led Rukia inside. Yoruichi was wearing a traditional captain’s uniform, while Rukia was simply wearing a bright yellow shirt with a short black skirt to go along with it. “So what’s new?” she asked, sitting down on the couch next to Orihime who was still in only a diaper and white shirt a few sizes too large. “I see Rukia was telling the truth,” Yoruichi said causing Orihime to blush, “you do look kinda cute in them though.” She winked.
         “Yeah,” Orihime said fidgeting on the couch a little before pulling her legs up to her chest, “and thank you.”
         “There’s no need to be embarrassed,” Yoruichi said putting her arm around Orihime, “I’ve seen just about everything in this world, and this isn’t bad.” Glancing over at Rukia on the arm-chair Yoruichi said, “You know Rukia, you’re small enough you’d probably look cute in them too.”
         Rukia turned a deep red as she stammered, “I have no need for diapers Yoruichi.”
         “Aww,” Orihime whined, “you don’t want to even try them?”
         Rukia simply blushed further, something Yoruichi quickly seized upon, “Well it’s your choice I suppose.” She turned to face Tatsuki again, “I unfortunately must be going, time to be back at Soul Society for a while.”
         “Oh,” Tatsuki said surprised, “you didn’t need to come here to say goodbye, we don’t really know each other that well.”
         “I actually came to ask if Rukia could live here for a while.” Yoruichi stated. “The Kurosaki’s are gone for a while and with me being gone now too, she doesn’t have anywhere to live.”
         “Yay!” Orihime chirped as she ran over to hug Rukia, “You can sleep in my room!” Orihime said, squeezing Rukia. “Oh wait… you might not want to stay in my room.”
         “Why?” Rukia asked her voice muffled from Orihime’s embrace.
         Orihime loosened her grip and sat back down on the couch, blushing again. Tatsuki gestured to the diaper silently as Rukia acknowledged what she meant. “It’s okay Orihime,” Tatsuki said sitting down next to her, “we can get those supplies later today.” She whispered and Orihime nodded quietly.
         “So it’s settled then! Rukia will be staying with you two until I come back.” Yoruichi said, standing up to head for the door.
         “Wait, do I get a say in this?” Tatsuki said. “Not to be the bad guy, but how long are you gonna be gone? And why can’t she get her own place to stay?”
         Rukia blushed and began to curl into a ball on the chair while Yoruichi pulled Tatsuki aside. “Look, she’s been going through some tough times alright? And there was no need to say things like that you could have simply asked her yourself.” Yoruichi chided. “Rukia and Orihime have a connection anyway, and you should have heard her when she told me about those diapers yesterday.” Yoruichi smiled at the thought while Tatsuki simply blushed, “I’m sure she’ll be joining her soon.” They looked over at the pair. Rukia had gone over to the couch and was with Orihime who was trying to cheer her up. “Are you into this too?”
         “Well… I umm…” Tatsuki began but couldn’t complete the thought.
         “I see,” Yoruichi said, “Well tell you what, when I come back I can take care of your diaper stuff so you can join Orihime and Rukia.” A shocked look crossed Tatsuki’s face at the suggestion, “I’ll take that as a yes.” She giggled. “Well I really need to go now, Rukia has money so that shouldn’t be an issue,” Yoruichi turned and headed for the door before adding in a low whisper, “I’ll be back baby.” She got to the door and opened it and waved goodbye.
         Tatsuki was still staring dumbfounded at the door. She quickly pulled herself together and went back to Orihime and Rukia. “Rukia, I…”
         “I’m sorry Tatsuki.” Rukia stammered tears in her eyes. “I don’t mean to be a burden, and I can go find an apartment or something so I will be out of your hair.”
         Tatsuki took two steps over to Rukia, sat down on the couch, and hugged her close. “You won’t need to do any of that, okay?” Tatsuki assured her friend as the tears began to subside. “Just as long as you’re okay with Orihime being in diapers and what comes with it, as well as cooperating around the house, there isn’t a need for you to leave.”
         “I promise I’ll help out when I can.” Rukia said lifting her head off of Tatsuki’s shoulder.
         “Okay,” Tatsuki said happy that she had stopped crying. “Now, did you want to join Orihime?” Rukia began to blush again and tried speaking before Tatsuki stopped her, “Yoruichi told me how you reacted the other day back at her home, just know that if you want to try it, now would probably be the best time to do so.”
         Rukia was silent for a moment as she sat back on the couch. “Oh I know,” Orihime said as an idea popped in her head, “come to my room Rukia, I’ll show you the worst part of it.” She got up and pulled Rukia along. “Well, maybe show is the wrong word.” Orihime said as she toddled along and opened the door. “This is what it’ll smell like when you mess your diaper,” Orihime said as Rukia began to notice the foul odor, “or at least, something like this.”
         “Okay I get it,” Rukia gasped for clean air only to fill her lungs with the dirty diaper smell, “can we go back now?” she asked trying to get out of Orihime’s grip. Orihime smiled and closed the door again.
         When the two girls were back in the main room with Tatsuki she mentioned, “We’re planning on going to the store to get a bin for her used diapers and some air fresheners so it won’t smell so bad in there.” An uncertain look crossed Rukia’s face while Orihime seemed to agree with her now.
         “Yeah, and especially since you’re gonna be living and sleeping in my room you probably don’t like the smell of dirty diapers as much as me.” Orihime said.
         “So have you made up your mind yet Rukia?” Tatsuki asked.
111111111111.title: Play time with Rukia

1111111111111.content:
Rukia blushed and began twiddling her fingers, “Well umm…” she hesitated. On the one hand Orihime seems to really like her diapers and they’re kinda cute too… she thought to herself, but on the other hand do I want to be more of a burden to these two? Or even want to use a diaper around them? “Do I have to use the diapers if I wear them?” she asked.
         Tatsuki and Orihime nodded, “I’ll be changing you both” Tatsuki said, “I’m getting used to it already.”
         “Okay,” Rukia responded slowly thinking to herself. After a few more seconds she said with a blush, “I’d like to join Orihime if that’s okay Tatsuki?”
         “Yay!” Orihime cheered hugging Rukia, “we’re gonna have so much fun Rukia! We’ll be able to do all sorts of diaper stuff together.”
         “Okay Rukia, let’s get you changed.” Tatsuki said standing up and leading her back to Orihime’s room. Orihime followed along as well, still imagining all the things her and Rukia will be able to do now. Tatsuki opened the door and all three were again hit with the smell of Orihime’s previous diaper. “After this, we’ll go to the store.” Tatsuki said walking over to the changing mat and kneeling down, patting the mat. “Come on little missy, time to get you padded.”
         Rukia blushed as she scurried over, “This doesn’t hurt does it?”
         Orihime shook her head, “Nope, Tatsuki is very gentle.” She said causing Tatsuki to blush a little. “Oh, and you don’t have a rash yet,” Orihime added, “I’ve heard those can hurt a little.” Rukia grimaced as her underwear was stripped and she was laid down.
         “And that’s why I have to change your diapers,” Tatsuki said, “well that and they’d leak if you fill them too much.” She added as she placed the diaper under Rukia’s bottom. “But you haven’t even used on yet, so we’ll see how you like it and how your skin deals with it.” Tatsuki lectured powdering Rukia. “And if you do get a rash then there’s some cream we can use to help soothe it.” She added taping up the diaper. “And there you have it Rukia,” Tatsuki said pulling her friend up, “how does it feel?”
Rukia took a few steps and quickly had to re-adjust how she walked, the padding between her legs kept her from keeping them together. She lifted her skirt back up and felt the front of the diaper a bit. The plastic made an audible crinkle that everyone could hear, but the padding was very thick and Rukia enjoyed that. Walking over to the mirror in Orihime’s room, she lifted her skirt all the way up and twirled herself around, inspecting her diaper as best she could. Finally, she stuck her thumb in her mouth and giggled to herself before remembering the other two were there. “I really like it,” she blushed, “I feel… I’m not sure how I feel exactly.” She admitted. “Thank you Tatsuki, and you too Orihime.” She said waddling over to the pair. “Sorry you saw that.” She quietly said as well.
         “Oh, don’t worry about that.” Tatsuki said.
         “Yeah, it’s okay Rukia.” Orihime added. “Tatsuki already kinda acts like a mommy and I’m like her baby already, so she’s used to it.” Orihime blushed as she fiddled with her legs.
         “She’s right Rukia,” Tatsuki said, “which also answers what I was gonna ask you later Orihime. Would you like to be more of a baby with Orihime too?”
         “Can I wear only a diaper and a chappy shirt?” Rukia asked hopefully.
         “If that’s what you want, go for it.” Tatsuki said standing back up. Rukia slipped her skirt off as the three headed back to the main room. “Okay…” Tatsuki said, turning back to face the two diapered girls. “Well it looks like I’m the only one that can go out and get what we need, but I don’t want to leave my diapered babies at home all by themselves…” Tatsuki said.
         “We’ll be good mama.” Orihime said as she sat down on her cushy butt. “I’m the older sister anyway, so I’ll make sure Rukia is behaved.”
         Rukia playfully tackled Orihime, “Oh yes, I’m such a troublemaker!”
         Tatsuki simply laughed at the two having fun together. “Okay Orihime, you take care of each other while I’m gone. Remember that only I can change your diapers, and I know how many clean diapers are left so I’ll know if you change. I’ll be sure to punish you if something is amiss whenever I get back.” Tatsuki said half-seriously. She didn’t want them to change themselves, but as for a punishment that was a different story.
         The girls stopped their playing and sat cross-legged and nodded back to her, “Will you be mad if I use my diaper Tatsuki?” Rukia asked. “I mean mommy.”
         “Nope, just keep it all in the diaper until I get back.” Tatsuki said. “I’ll be getting some more diapers, a bin, and an air freshener. And a few other things for you two to have fun with.” Tatsuki ducked back into her room real quick to put on some more acceptable clothing. “Oh and enjoy yourselves okay?” she smiled as she headed out the door.
1111111111111.title: Rukia gets diapered

11111111111111.content:
“Bye mommy!” the girls called after her. “So, what do you wanna do Rukia?” Orihime asked sitting down on the couch.
         “I dunno sissy.” Rukia said, sitting down next to Orihime on the couch. She plopped her thumb back into her mouth, “I can’t believe I haven’t done this earlier.” She said slightly garbled due to her thumb.
         “I’m glad you like it Rukia.” Orihime said putting her arm around her. “You look so cute! Just like a real baby almost.” She laughed as she patted Rukia’s diaper while Rukia just blushed and laid down, putting her head on Orihime’s lap. “So how have you been?” Orihime asked as she began stroking Rukia’s hair.
         “I’m okay, kind of stressed out.” Rukia admitted. “I’m not really on duty for a long while, which is sort of sad but it lets me try out stuff like this.” She sighed. “This is the first time I’ve stopped caring, and maybe I shouldn’t do that.”
         “What do you mean?” Orihime asked.
         “I always have a reputation to uphold, but right now, with it just being us, I feel like none of that matters. Like I can finally relax.” Rukia said. “I’m sorry, I shouldn’t have talked about this” she said pulling her thumb out of her mouth.
         Orihime reached with her other hand and put Rukia’s thumb back in, “What did you just say about not caring?” Orihime said getting a surprised look from Rukia. “Please continue Rukia, I did the same thing to Tatsuki earlier this week and I felt much better afterwards and I could enjoy my diapers more.”
         “Okay.” Rukia took a deep breath then continued with her rant, telling Orihime about how she did not have any real parents and how big of a deal it was for her to uphold her adopted family’s name. She continued for thirty minutes, laying with her head on Orihime’s lap facing up, spilling everything that was troubling her. “Thank you Orihime.” Rukia said softly when she was all finished. Sticking her thumb back in her mouth she cuddled close to Orihime’s tummy and took several deep breaths.
         “You’re welcome.” Orihime said softly as she let Rukia calm down. “Does that feel better?” she asked to which Rukia nodded her head slowly and simply began staring up at Orihime. “What?”
         “Nothing, I just am feeling pretty good right now.” Rukia said.
         “Oh,” Orihime said, “well that’s good.” She said reaching down to Rukia’s tummy and slowly rubbing it.
         “What are you doing?” Rukia asked pulling her thumb out of her mouth and wiping the drool off with her shirt.
         “Just helping you relax, does this feel good?” Orihime asked. Rukia nodded as she let her eyes wander around the rest of the room. Orihime began humming softly as she kept going around Rukia’s stomach with her hand, “Want to take a little nap with me sissy?” she yawned.
         Rukia rubbed her eyes and nodded, getting off of Orihime so the two could go back to her room. “Sorry about the smell still,” Orihime said, “I wasn’t really expecting someone to sleep in my room with me.”
         “It’s okay sissy,” Rukia said as she followed Orihime in. Rukia still had one thumb in her mouth and the other was dangling in Orihime’s grasp. “I think I’ll be adding to the smell soon enough.” She giggled mischievously. “And I umm… kinda like it too.” She added softly.
         “That’s okay, and you can tell me what you think after you do add to the smell.” Orihime said. “Did you need to go before we fall asleep?” she yawned as she laid down.
         “A little, but I’ll wait until later.” Rukia yawned as she laid down too. “Can we snuggle Orihime?” Rukia asked quietly.
         “Of course sissy.” Orihime responded, as the two climbed under the light sheets and snuggled close together before drifting off to sleep
11111111111111.title: Orihime and Rukia alone

111111111111111.content:
A couple hours passed before Tatsuki arrived back home with some more supplies. She sat everything down before going to look for the girls, hoping that everything was alright. Noticing Orihime’s door was still open, she decided to peek inside to find the two girls sleeping next to one another. Smiling, she walked over to the two and gently shook them awake. “Sorry girls, but you can’t sleep too much or you won’t get any tonight.”
         Orihime rolled onto her back and yawned, “Alright mommy.”
         Rukia clung to Orihime for a few more seconds before realizing Tatsuki was there. Blushing, she let go and asked, “How was shopping?”
         “Pretty good,” Tatsuki said as she helped the girls out of the bed, “want to see what I got?” Both girls nodded. “Well come on then.” she said as they waddled after her. Tatsuki sat them back down on the couch before she dragged the bags back into the main room. “Okay, first we have the diaper bin.” Tatsuki said as she pulled out a small white bin that had a label “Keeps baby’s room smelling fresh.” The girls giggled a little when they noticed it. “I also got some air freshener,” she said tossing two aerosol cans to Orihime and Rukia, “and I got a few more bags of diapers.” She added, pulling out three more packs of diapers similar to the one Orihime had.
         “Ohh,” Orihime said excitedly, “I guess we’re gonna be using more of those now.” She said, causing Rukia to blush.
